title: Exploring data - Los Angeles rainfall inches

content.question:
The summary statistics for the number of inches of rainfall in Los Angeles for 117 years, beginning in 1877, are shown below.

Describe a procedure that uses these summary statistics to determine whether there are outliers.

Are there outliers in these data?

Justify your answer based on the procedures you described in part (a).

The news media reported that in a particular year, there were only 10 inches of rainfall. Use the information provided to comment on this reported statement.

topic.text: 1.6: Describing the Distribution of a Quantitative Variable

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe data presented numerically or graphically.
